name: Mygreenthumb
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my green thumb
des:
This skill helps you keep tracking of watering your plants!
Instructions:
“Alexa, launch my green thumb”
“… Would you like to create a new watering reminder?”
“Yes”
“What is the name of your plant”
“The name is snake”
“How much water should your snake plant be watered”
“20% of pot volume”
“how often should your snake plant be watered”
“every 2 weeks at 9:30 AM” or “once a week on Monday” or “once a month on Tuesday at 5:15pm”
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
